articles.author: Joel Rebello
articles.title: Life insurers' claim settlements stable despite Covid
articles.description: Indian life insurers' claim settlement ratios have remained mostly stable during the Covid-19 period compared with earlier years despite an uptick in claims as the regulator pushed for easier settlements amid a once-in-a-century pandemic.
